section.title: Data Warehouse Configuration Notes

formalpara.title: Behavior
formalpara.para: The following behavior is expected in engine-setup:

section.para: Install the Data Warehouse package, run engine-setup, and answer No to configuring Data Warehouse:
section.screen: Configure Data Warehouse on this host (Yes, No) [Yes]: No
section.para: Run engine-setup again; setup no longer presents the option to configure those services.

formalpara.title: Workaround
formalpara.para: To force engine-setup to present both options again, run engine-setup --reconfigure-optional-components.

note.para: To configure only the currently installed Data Warehouse packages, and prevent setup from applying package updates found in enabled repositories, add the --offline option .
